articles.title: Centre Changes, Chaos And Confusion Headline Day 1 Of CUET Exam
articles.description: A late-night change in centres for the CUET resulted in hundreds of students missing the exam. The test is a key requirement for undergraduate admissions to central universities.
articles.content:
The CUET exam is being conducted in two phases.
New Delhi: Diksha, a student appearing for the Common University Entrance Test (CUET), pleads in front of the authorities at the examination centre to… [+2406 chars]

articles.title: Congress flies out 5 Goa MLAs to Chennai over poaching fears
articles.description: This comes a week after the party was hit with reports of internal mutiny and right ahead of the presidential election on July 18. The Congress fears that some of the MLAs might cross vote, bringing further embarrassment to the party.
articles.content:
The Congress flew out five Goa MLAs to Chennai last evening after the Assembly proceedings ended for the day, fearing poaching by the BJP. The MLAs are staying at a five-star hotel in the city.
This… [+3913 chars]
